### 提取实体信息

#### 第一部分：Unit Dependency Graph and its Application to Arithmetic Word Problem Solving

##### 1. 提取的章节
- **INTRODUCTION**
- **UNIT DEPENDENCY GRAPH**

##### 2. 提取的实体

```json
[
  {
    "algorithm_entity": {
      "algorithm_id": "Roy2017_UnitDependencyGraph",
      "entity_type": "Algorithm",
      "name": "Unit Dependency Graph (UDG)",
      "year": 2017,
      "authors": ["Roy, S.", "Roth, D."],
      "task": "Arithmetic Word Problem Solving",
      "dataset": ["AllArith_2017", "MAWPS_2016"],
      "metrics": ["Accuracy_ArithmeticWordProblem", "ErrorReduction_ErrorAnalysis"],
      "architecture": {
        "components": ["Vertex Classifier", "Edge Classifier", "Constrained Inference Module"],
        "connections": ["Vertex Classifier -> Edge Classifier -> Constrained Inference Module"],
        "mechanisms": ["Rate Detection", "SAME UNIT Edge", "NUM UNIT Edge", "DEN UNIT Edge"]
      },
      "methodology": {
        "training_strategy": ["Decomposed Model", "Joint Inference"],
        "parameter_tuning": ["Scaling Parameters", "Beam Size"]
      },
      "feature_processing": ["Context Features", "Rule Based Extraction Features"]
    }
  },
  {
    "dataset_entity": {
      "dataset_id": "AllArith_2017",
      "entity_type": "Dataset",
      "name": "AllArith",
      "description": "A dataset of arithmetic word problems",
      "domain": "Mathematics",
      "size": 831,
      "year": 2017,
      "creators": ["Roy, S.", "Roth, D."]
    }
  },
  {
    "dataset_entity": {
      "dataset_id": "MAWPS_2016",
      "entity_type": "Dataset",
      "name": "MAWPS",
      "description": "A math word problem repository",
      "domain": "Mathematics",
      "size": 415,
      "year": 2016,
      "creators": ["Koncel-Kedziorski, R.", "Roy, S.", "Amini, A.", "Kushman, N.", "Hajishirzi, H."]
    }
  },
  {
    "metric_entity": {
      "metric_id": "Accuracy_ArithmeticWordProblem",
      "entity_type": "Metric",
      "name": "Accuracy",
      "description": "Accuracy of solving arithmetic word problems",
      "category": "Arithmetic Word Problem Solving",
      "formula": "Correct Solutions / Total Problems"
    }
  },
  {
    "metric_entity": {
      "metric_id": "ErrorReduction_ErrorAnalysis",
      "entity_type": "Metric",
      "name": "Error Reduction",
      "description": "Reduction in error rate of the solver",
      "category": "Error Analysis",
      "formula": "(Initial Error Rate - Final Error Rate) / Initial Error Rate"
    }
  }
]
```

#### 提取总结
1. 刚刚提取的是 **INTRODUCTION** 和 **UNIT DEPENDENCY GRAPH** 小节。
2. 论文中还有其他小节未被提取。
3. 下一个要提取的小节是 **LEARNING TO PREDICT UDGs**。

#### 第二部分：Learning to Predict UDGs

##### 1. 提取的章节
- **LEARNING TO PREDICT UDGs**

##### 2. 提取的实体

```json
[
  {
    "algorithm_entity": {
      "algorithm_id": "Roy2017_VertexClassifier",
      "entity_type": "Algorithm",
      "name": "Vertex Classifier",
      "year": 2017,
      "authors": ["Roy, S.", "Roth, D."],
      "task": "Rate Detection in UDG",
      "dataset": ["AllArith_2017"],
      "metrics": ["Accuracy_ArithmeticWordProblem"],
      "architecture": {
        "components": ["Binary Classifier"],
        "connections": [],
        "mechanisms": ["RATE Label", "NOT RATE Label"]
      },
      "methodology": {
        "training_strategy": ["Binary Classification"],
        "parameter_tuning": ["Context Features", "Rule Based Extraction Features"]
      },
      "feature_processing": ["Context Features", "Rule Based Extraction Features"]
    }
  },
  {
    "algorithm_entity": {
      "algorithm_id": "Roy2017_EdgeClassifier",
      "entity_type": "Algorithm",
      "name": "Edge Classifier",
      "year": 2017,
      "authors": ["Roy, S.", "Roth, D."],
      "task": "Edge Property Prediction in UDG",
      "dataset": ["AllArith_2017"],
      "metrics": ["Accuracy_ArithmeticWordProblem"],
      "architecture": {
        "components": ["Multiclass Classifier"],
        "connections": [],
        "mechanisms": ["SAME UNIT", "NO RELATION", "RATE→Num", "RATE←Num", "RATE→Den", "RATE←Den"]
      },
      "methodology": {
        "training_strategy": ["Multiclass Classification"],
        "parameter_tuning": ["Context Features", "Rule Based Extraction Features"]
      },
      "feature_processing": ["Context Features", "Rule Based Extraction Features"]
    }
  },
  {
    "algorithm_entity": {
      "algorithm_id": "Roy2017_ConstrainedInference",
      "entity_type": "Algorithm",
      "name": "Constrained Inference Module",
      "year": 2017,
      "authors": ["Roy, S.", "Roth, D."],
      "task": "Combining Vertex and Edge Predictions",
      "dataset": ["AllArith_2017"],
      "metrics": ["Accuracy_ArithmeticWordProblem"],
      "architecture": {
        "components": ["Constrained Inference"],
        "connections": ["Vertex Classifier -> Constrained Inference", "Edge Classifier -> Constrained Inference"],
        "mechanisms": ["Score Aggregation", "Label Mapping"]
      },
      "methodology": {
        "training_strategy": ["Constrained Inference"],
        "parameter_tuning": ["Scaling Parameters"]
      },
      "feature_processing": []
    }
  }
]
```

### 继续提取实体信息

#### 第三部分：Joint Inference With An Arithmetic Solver

##### 1. 提取的章节
- **JOINT INFERENCE WITH AN ARITHMETIC SOLVER**

##### 2. 提取的实体

```json
[
  {
    "algorithm_entity": {
      "algorithm_id": "Roy2017_JointInference",
      "entity_type": "Algorithm",
      "name": "Joint Inference",
      "year": 2017,
      "authors": ["Roy, S.", "Roth, D."],
      "task": "Joint Prediction of UDG and Solution",
      "dataset": ["AllArith_2017"],
      "metrics": ["Accuracy_ArithmeticWordProblem"],
      "architecture": {
        "components": ["Joint Inference Module"],
        "connections": ["Vertex Classifier -> Joint Inference", "Edge Classifier -> Joint Inference"],
        "mechanisms": ["Score Aggregation", "Label Mapping"]
      },
      "methodology": {
        "training_strategy": ["Joint Inference"],
        "parameter_tuning": ["Scaling Parameters"]
      },
      "feature_processing": []
    }
  },
  {
    "algorithm_entity": {
      "algorithm_id": "Roy2015_ArithmeticWordProblemSolver",
      "entity_type": "Algorithm",
      "name": "Arithmetic Word Problem Solver",
      "year": 2015,
      "authors": ["Roy, S.", "Roth, D."],
      "task": "Solving Arithmetic Word Problems",
      "dataset": ["AllArith_2017"],
      "metrics": ["Accuracy_ArithmeticWordProblem"],
      "architecture": {
        "components": ["Irrelevance Classifier", "LCA Operation Classifier"],
        "connections": ["Irrelevance Classifier -> LCA Operation Classifier"],
        "mechanisms": ["Expression Tree Construction", "Monotonic Expression Tree"]
      },
      "methodology": {
        "training_strategy": ["Binary Classification", "Multiclass Classification"],
        "parameter_tuning": ["Scaling Parameters"]
      },
      "feature_processing": ["Context Features", "Rule Based Extraction Features"]
    }
  }
]
```

#### 提取总结
1. 刚刚提取的是 **JOINT INFERENCE WITH AN ARITHMETIC SOLVER** 小节。
2. 论文中还有其他小节未被提取。
3. 下一个要提取的小节是 **EXPERIMENTS**。

#### 第四部分：Experiments

- **EXPERIMENTS**

##### 2. 提取的实体

```json
[
  {
    "dataset_entity": {
      "dataset_id": "AllArithLex_2017",
      "entity_type": "Dataset",
      "name": "AllArithLex",
      "description": "Subset of AllArith with low lexical overlap",
      "domain": "Mathematics",
      "size": 831,
      "year": 2017,
      "creators": ["Roy, S.", "Roth, D."]
    }
  },
  {
    "dataset_entity": {
      "dataset_id": "AllArithTmpl_2017",
      "entity_type": "Dataset",
      "name": "AllArithTmpl",
      "description": "Subset of AllArith with low template overlap",
      "domain": "Mathematics",
      "size": 831,
      "year": 2017,
      "creators": ["Roy, S.", "Roth, D."]
    }
  },
  {
    "metric_entity": {
      "metric_id": "Accuracy_SolvingArithmeticWordProblems",
      "entity_type": "Metric",
      "name": "Accuracy",
      "description": "Accuracy of solving arithmetic word problems",
      "category": "Arithmetic Word Problem Solving",
      "formula": "Correct Solutions / Total Problems"
    }
  }
]
```
